"The last living thing on Earth was a magician who lost his magic!
Bluie tried different tricks but with no luck- his life was tragic.

He thought of olden days when the Earth was cool and blue
It shrank and all living things vanished without a clue.

"
"I need to go too but how, and where to?... thought Bluie.Without magic, he felt hot and gooey.

Lonely Bluie craved to go for a swim...

 As days went by- a time traveler scientist spotted him!""Bluie was surprised to see someone suddenly!

Moli the scientist was really nice and friendly.

Both were happy to find a new friend from past and present, 

They made plans to stay together till the end. 

 "Moli took Bluie in her faster than the speed of light- "time machine"

They time traveled to the past when the Earth was big and green!
Life in the olden times looked really nice and cool,

Bluie wished to quickly jump into the pool!

 

"The lush green Earth had valleys of colourful flowers.Full of many living things, enjoying life for hours.

Bluie ran with joy to say hello to the past world,

 Where there was still hope and plenty of colours!"

"Moli told everyone that Bluie came from the future,

At the time when planet Earth turned red without nurture.

Bluie celebrated the beauty of the past time gone,

He made new friends and was not alone!"

Replay the video if you wish to listen to the story again.
When you are ready, go to the next task.
